name: awesome.json
description: awesome.json == A curated list in JSON format.

scripts.build: cd parser && node gen-all-awesome-list.js && mv ./awesome-json/sindresorhus-awesome.json ../all-github-path && mv ./awesome-json/*.json ../repo-json
scripts.push: git pull --no-edit origin master && git add . && git commit -m 'updated json' && git push origin update-branch

author: Calvin Jeng <locky4567@gmail.com> (https://github.com/lockys)
